sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或短语动词均有"继续"之意。
means: continue ： 普通用词。或指持续而不停止，或有一段中断后又继续下去。
succeed ： 侧重指有规律地连续。
go on ： 通俗用词，多用于口语中。go on+-ing表暂停后继续做原事，即后继续的内容与原来的内容相同。go on+不定式指做完某事后，接着做不同的另一件事。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"兴旺，成功"之意。
means: flourish ： 指处于成功、繁荣、进步的顶盛阶段。
thrive ： 指蓬勃发展，常指显而易见的成功。
succeed ： 表示成功，强调完成某件想往或企图去做的事，与fail相对。
prosper ： 指持续不断地成功，也指越来越成功。

sentence.Network_en: I have a sneaking suspicion that they are going to succeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我隐隐觉得他们恐怕要成功了。

sentence.Network_en: He was too inexperienced and too inexpert to succeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他太缺乏经验，太不熟练，难以成功。

sentence.Network_en: They are waiting anxiously to see who will succeed him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们焦急地等待着看谁会接替他上任。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中兴字的解释 ... (10) 推举;选拔[ promote] (12) 成功[ succeed] (14) 派遣;发动[ send;start].
字典中承字的解释 ... ◎ 承 chéng (4) 继承[ succeed] (6) 接受;承受[ receive;accept;bear;suffer].
接字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 接谈〖 receiveanddiscuss〗 接替〖 succeed;vice;replace;takeover〗 接通〖 putthrough〗.
英语单词词形转换 - 豆丁网 ... stranger n. 陌生人 succeed v. 获得成功 --------- success n. 成功.

list.abs: 得标... ... 得胜 to triumph over an opponent 得手 to succeed;to come off;to go smoothly 得宜 appropriate;proper;suitable.
succedent 随后的succeed at 成功方面succeed to 继承
succeed的翻译... ... succeedin 在...获得成功 succeed oneself [美]再度当选, 连任, 留任 succeed sb. as 继某人出任(某职).
they succeed in climbing the mountain .他们成功地登上了山。

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)success leads to opportunities for further and greater successes

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French succeder or Latin succedere 'come close after', from sub- 'close to' + cedere 'go'

encyclopedia.content: 漫画简介 漫画名称：SUCCEED 作 者： 秋本治 索引字母： S 漫画区域： 日本 漫画题材： 搞笑 漫画类型： 少年漫画 漫画介绍 SUCCEED漫画 ，乌龙派出所作者 秋本治的最新短篇，当然秉承他一贯无厘头搞笑风格。

entry.tran: 达到目的;成功做成;办到
entry.def: If you succeed in doing something, you manage to do it.

example.ex: We have already succeeded in working out ground rules with the Department of Defense...
example.tran: 我们已经成功地与国防部敲定了基本原则。

example.ex: Some people will succeed in their efforts to stop smoking...
example.tran: 一些人经过努力可以成功戒烟。

entry.tran: 取得预期效果;表现良好
entry.def: If something succeeds, it works in a satisfactory way or has the result that is intended.

example.ex: If marriage is to succeed in the 1990's, then people have to recognise the new pressures it is facing.
example.tran: 在 20 世纪 90 年代人们要想婚姻美满，那就不得不认识到它所面临的新压力。

example.ex: ...a move which would make any future talks even more unlikely to succeed.
example.tran: 可能使今后的所有对话都更加难以取得什么成果的举动

entry.def: Someone who succeeds gains a high position in what they do, for example in business or politics.

example.ex: ...the skills and qualities needed to succeed in small and medium-sized businesses.
example.tran: 经营好中小企业所需的技能和素质

entry.def: If you succeed another person, you are the next person to have their job or position.

example.ex: David Rowland is almost certain to succeed him as chairman on January 1...
example.tran: 戴维·罗兰将在 1 月 1 日接替他任主席几乎已成定局。

example.ex: The present ruler, Prince Rainier III, succeeded to the throne on 9 May 1949.
example.tran: 现任元首，兰尼埃三世亲王于 1949 年 5 月 9 日继位。

entry.def: If one thing is succeeded by another thing, the other thing happens or comes after it.

example.ex: A quick divorce can be succeeded by a much longer — and more agonising — period of haggling over the fate of the family.
example.tran: 闪电式离婚后可能紧接着就是一段在家庭命运上互相纠结的更加漫长、更加痛苦的时期。

means.word_mean: 1. attain success or reach a desired goal;

sentences.sentence: "We succeeded in getting tickets to the show"
"she struggled to overcome her handicap and won"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Under your guidance I am sure we will succeed.

auth_sentence.res_content: We believe that many of them will not succeed.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"

stems_affixes.word_buile: suc在下面;随后+cinct捆→在下面先捆好→简洁的
suc在下面;随后+ceed走→从下走到上面→成功
suc在下面;随后+cumb躺→躺下去→屈从;死亡
pro向前+ceed行走,前进→向前走的过程
pro向前+ceed行走,前进+s表复数→向前做事得到的收入
pro向前+ceed行走,前进→向前走→前进
pro向前+ceed行走,前进→向前走的过程
suc随后+ceed行走,前进→随后跟上→继续→继续做→成功

Sentence.sentence: If he succeeds in curbing costs—a big if—it would be a huge gain for America.
By channelling the magic of computing into products, Steve Jobs had succeeded in
Being surrounded by white peers motivates a black student to work harder to succeed.
This level of wastage is a tragedy that cannot continue if we are to succeed in the challenge of sustainably meeting our future food demands.
Businesses are less likely to succeed without setting realistic goals.
Both can succeed depending on the specific situation.

sentences.cn: 我们的计划顺利完成了。

sentences.en: She's the type of person who succeeds anywhere.
sentences.cn: 她是不论到什么地方都会飞黄腾达的那种人。

means.word_mean: 继承, 继任, 继位

sentences.en: If he has no children, who will succeed?
sentences.cn: 如果他没有孩子, 谁将继位?

sentences.en: His speech was succeeded by a silence.
sentences.cn: 他讲演后紧接着是一片沉默。

jushi.english: If this work succeeds, you and I can do things together.
jushi.chinese: 如果这项工作成功,你我就可以合作了。

jushi.english: He is in a fair way to succeed.
